verses.text: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
O my soul, thou hast said unto the Lord, Thou artmy Lord: My goodness extendethnot to thee;
Butto the saints that arein the earth, And tothe excellent, in whom isall my delight.
Their sorrows shall be multiplied thathasten afteranother god:Their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, Nor take up their names into my lips.
The Lordisthe portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: Thou maintainest my lot.
The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places;Yea, I have a goodly heritage.
I will bless the Lord, who hath given me counsel: My reins also instruct me inthe night seasons.
I have set the Lordalways before me: Because he isat my right hand, I shall not be moved.
Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: My flesh also shall rest in hope.
For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; Neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
Thou wilt shew me the path of life: In thy presence isfulness of joy; At thy right hand there arepleasures for evermore.
